Package com.rolemodelsoft.drawlet.examples.jfc

Class Summary
ExitingFrame  
SimpleModelPanel This is a trivial example of how one might separate some underlying model from presentation to the user.
SimplePanel Although there are plenty of ways to use the drawlet framework, it may not be apparent without some examples.
SimpleScrollingPanel This is a beginning attempt at a scrolling implemenation with JFC.
SimplestPanel Although there are plenty of ways to use the drawlet framework, it may not be apparent without some examples.
